section.name: Upgrade procedure
section.p: If you already have a functioning installation with a previous version of DSA/Catalogue, then your should follow this procedure to upgrade the software rather than repeating the full, installation procedure.

ol.li: Check the release notes for any changes in the required configuration.
Alter astrogrid.properties as advised in the release notes (changes here are common).
Alter the metadoc file if so instructed in the release notes (changes here are rare).
Remove the installation from Tomcat (use the undeploy link on Tomcat's manager page).
Redeploy the new war file into Tomcat using the old context-file (see the back-up instructions to find the context file).
Update the registration if so advised in the release notes.
